author: Special Correspondent
text:
A meeting of Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation’s Grievance Redressal Forum will be held at its K. Pudur office here on March 4. According to a release, the Superintending Engineer, Madurai Distribution Circle, will chair the meeting in the presence of a member of the Tamil Nadu Electricity Regulatory Commission.

Power consumers of Madurai East, Samayanallur, Tirumangalam and Usilampatti divisions can participate in the meeting, which is to be held from 11 a.m., to get their grievances redressed.
title: Grievance redressal forum meet
